group_1.textRight: ... So you had a nightmare like that.

group_1.textLeft: I sure did...
I was depressed the entire day.

group_1.textRight: But, Karin,
you're so actively involved with Halloween events,
so don't you think you have plenty of@Halloween spirit?

group_1.textLeft: Thanks a bunch!
Since it was Kaede who told me that,
hearing it straight from her was a big shock.
I wanted to become the most Halloweeny@Magical Girl there is,
so I've been putting full effort in.
At least I thought I had gotten my confidence back...@[chara:101202:cheek_0][chara:101202:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json]But...

group_1.textRight: (Kaede's words truly had an effect on her,@didn't they...)

group_1.textLeft: There's no way I can help with the Sakae Halloween Festa anymore.
It might be a bit of a shock.

group_1.textRight: Halloween Festa?

group_1.textLeft: It's an event organized by the Sakae Comprehensive School.
I was picked to be part of the executive committee@and got super excited, but...
I can't participate while I'm hospitalized.
... The fact that you are still haunted by nightmares
over just the littlest of things
means you thought you could overcome them,
but in the end you have yet to overcome@anything, si.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!@[wait:2][chara:100601:cheek_0][chara:100601:face_mtn_ex_020.exp3.json][chara:100601:lipSynch_1][chara:100601:motion_200]Hold on, Alina!

group_1.textLeft: What? Something wrong?

group_1.textRight: ... Perhaps it is just as Alina says.
(She's been hurt even deeper than I had thought...)

group_1.textLeft: That's what I thought, too,
so I decided to face it head on again.

group_1.textRight: Face what?

group_1.textLeft: The spirit of Halloween, of course!

group_1.textRight: Alina has no care in the world about any of that...

group_1.textLeft: I don't care!
As the Magical Girl born of Halloween,
[chara:101202:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]my pride is on the line!

group_1.textRight: But... what will you do to face your problem?

group_1.textLeft: How nice of you to ask!
Since it's nearly Halloween...
I've decided to draw a manga with the theme of Halloween spirit!
My dream is to become a mangaka, so through@my work
I feel like I can get closer to answering the question
"What does Halloween feel like?"

group_1.textRight: "What does Halloween feel like"...?
Why do you think it's such a silly theme,@rarely seen in the history of art?

group_1.textLeft: I don't care if it's something insignificant!
I'm going to draw a manga with the most amazing Halloween feeling,
and this time I will prove myself to Kaede.

group_1.textRight: How wonderful, that's the spirit!

group_1.textLeft: Haa...

group_1.textRight: Besides, it is almost time for you to be discharged@from the hospital, Karin,
so I am sure people will read your manga just like before...
Spending time doing what you used to normally
I don't think is a bad idea at all.

group_1.textLeft: Discharged...@Now that you mention it, that is true.
I did dream that I was being discharged since it's almost time for me.

group_1.textRight: And Alina, please give some gentle coaching@to Karin, okay?
